summary: A documentary portrait of the brash American producer and distributor Joseph E.Levine, known for his successful promotions of Godzilla and Hercules,and now working on the US release of an Italian art film.
cast: Joseph E. Levine|Sophia Loren|Norman Rosten|David Susskind|Stanley Baker|Alain Delon|Kim Novak|Carlo Ponti|Tony Randall|Romy Schneider|Barbara Valentin
title: Showman
